poem:
Title: "Echoes of an Unending Despair"

Within clock chimes, shadows of a ceaseless dread unfurl,
Hamas weaves through the desert time; bitter sands whirl.
Kinsmen shattered - Gaza echoes in wailed refrain,
Their existence- footnotes to an unread auction, pain's domain.
In arithmetic of war, figures stumble, numbed story unseen,
Yet, mankind persists, amidst the sanguine sheen.
Turn toward peace, let us, the silent majority plead,
Chorus: Gaza, Israel, offer life instead.
